description: Ms. codex. Title from leaf 2a. Physical description: 16 lines per page; written in shikastah in black on blue glazed, laid European paper. Catchwords. Occasional staining. Origin: Likely early 19th century. Incipit: الحمد لله الذي مهد لنا طريق الاصلاح ... فيقول ... هذا کتاب جمعت فيه مسائل الحلال و الحرام
author: Mujāhid, Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī, 1766 or 1767-1826 or 1827
extent: 122 leaves : paper ; 206 x 166 (163 x 109) mm bound to 209 x 170 mm
provenance: On leaf 1a, waqf statement dated 1259 H [1843 or 1844].
dlme_provenance_en: On leaf 1a, waqf statement dated 1259 H [1843 or 1844].
creator: Mujāhid, Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī, 1766 or 1767-1826 or 1827
مجاهد، محمد بن علي، 1766 or 1767-1826 or 1827

subject: Islamic law
binding_note: Limp black leather with blind-stamped central mandorla and pendants and blind-tooled fillets.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
